item.title: Research Experience
item.description: RL quadruped load adaptation, Haining, China May. 2024–Today Advisor: Prof. Liangjing, Yang (iZJU) Quadruped Robotics Go2 can walk only on the joint information of itself (use teacher-student model) Use issac_gym and legged_gym as basic platforms to train Go2 in the simulation Self-adaptation without knowing the information of loadings Still under constructing … Project reproduction, Reaction-Based Motion Planning with Deep Reinforcement Learning, Haining, China Feb. 2024–Mar. 2024 Self-Learning, Reproduction Connect APF and DDPG together to overcome the shortness of APF
